page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area covers: 1. Part of{Great Baddow,}(a large village 1.5kms south east of {Chelmsford,}the County Town of {Essex) 2.Village of{Sandon 3.Farmland,mostly arable 4.River Chelmer 5.Sand and gravel pits The survey was carried out by 4th.yr. Junior pupils of Rothmans County Primary{School.}The children were helped by their class teachers, Valerie Webb & Pat Richardson; their head teacher,Gillian Mackley; School Governors,Valerie Sanderson,Mary Hodgson and Clive Spratt; School caretaker, Ray Robinson; Parents, Mrs. Holloway, Gloria Crosier, Mesdames Eddy, Rook, Stoker, Bangs, Millan, Holloway, Murphy and Holloway.
